message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 by you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am proposing a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
